for_sales.sales_text:
Beautiful capable daysailer for day trips, road adventures and coastal exploration.

She’s also the perfect boat for a nice relaxed sail down the lake with plenty of space.   Stable, comfortable and very easy to beach for a picnic or BBQ.

In great condition with 3.5hp outboard, Jeckyll sails, sprayhood, cover and braked road trailer.

boat.full_description:
A great little boat - very stable with her long ballast keel and shoal draft, she is the perfect boat for a day about the coast or lake and exploring even the shallowest bay. Easy to sail singlehanded, with very comfortable movement through waves for her size and ample space inside for up to six people and picnic or overnight gear.

The forward floor can be raised to seat level and form a nice platform to sleep two people under the spray hood.

The spray hood provides comfy shelter in a squall and the 3.5hp Mercury engine in the outboard well takes her easily up to 5kts should the wind let you down.

The boat is also easily launched and recovered on a slip- way with her very good braked trailer.

The build quality is excellent and she is in beautiful con- dition, having seen very light use and been well looked after.

Including two wheel braked road trailer, 3.5hp Mercury engine, Spray hood, Full Cover, Sail cover, Jeckell’s sails and fenders.
boat.name: Amalena
boat.short_description: Beautiful capable daysailer for day trips, road adventures and coastal exploration or a nice sail down the lake and beach for a picnick or BBQ.
